QuestData.Title: What? What? In My Gut...?
QuestData.Description: Wha...what IS this!?$b$bThere's great pain growing... from deep in my bowels.$b$bI think... ugh... they must have poisoned me!$b$bThey fed us strangely glowing seaweed that they grow around their stronghold...$b$bI think these cramps will worsen if I don't get more soon...$b$bPlease, $r. Try to find me some!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 7 Wiggleweed Sprouts from Shimmerspine Harvesters in The Clutch.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to find me any of their seaweed, $r?
QuestData.RewardText: Yes, yes. This is the stuff.$b$bMaybe I can wean off of it and avoid the side-effect.$b$bThank you, $n.
